function.name: bits_count
function.block: { int t = v >> 32; int p = (v & ((1LL << 32) - 1)); return bits_count(t) + bits_count(p); }

function.name: operator<<
function.block: { bool first = true; os << "["; for (unsigned int i = 0; i < v.size(); i++){ if (!first)os << ", "; os << v[i]; first = false; }return os << "]"; }

function.name: binpow
function.block: { ll res = 1; while (n){ if (n & 1)res *= x; x *= x; n >>= 1; }return res; }

function.name: powmod
function.block: { ll res = 1; while (n){ if (n & 1)res = (res*x) % _mod; x = (x*x) % _mod; n >>= 1; }return res; }

function.name: gcd
function.block: { ll t; while (b){ a = a%b; t = a; a = b; b = t; }return a; }

function.name: gcd
function.block: { int t; while (b){ a = a%b; t = a; a = b; b = t; }return a; }
